p: The MIC of protein extracts was equal to 5 μg/mL for all pathogens except for E. coli (2.5 μg/mL) ( Table 3 ). In addition, the inhibitory effects of both Tris buffer and warm aqueous extracts were similar. Also, the two mushroom extracts had no activity against T. mentagrophytes, M. gypseum, and M. ferugineum. Among the test pathogens, the E. coli was the most sensitive microorganism to Tris and warm aqueous extracts.
